title: Compilation error: libATen.so.1: undefined reference to `convolve_5x5_sse'
body_html:
I am experiencing a problem compiling, which involves ATen (I see that some work was done by @gchanan a few hours ago on ATen, but similar issues were also reported days ago).

I posted earlier the issue in the only issue relevant to convolve_5x5_sse the following:

[...]
../libATen.so.1: undefined reference to `convolve_5x5_sse'
: to install,

export CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH="$(dirname $(which conda))/../" 
conda install numpy pyyaml mkl setuptools cmake cffi
conda install -c soumith magma-cuda80
git clone --recursive https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch 

python setup.py install

as per the instructions at https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch#from-source

Results:

../libATen.so.1: undefined reference to `convolve_5x5_sse'
collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
src/ATen/test/CMakeFiles/basic.dir/build.make:114: recipe for target 'src/ATen/test/basic' failed
make[2]: *** [src/ATen/test/basic] Error 1
CMakeFiles/Makefile2:338: recipe for target 'src/ATen/test/CMakeFiles/basic.dir/all' failed
make[1]: *** [src/ATen/test/CMakeFiles/basic.dir/all] Error 2
make[1]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
../libATen.so.1: undefined reference to `convolve_5x5_sse'
collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
src/ATen/test/CMakeFiles/undefined_tensor_test.dir/build.make:114: recipe for target 'src/ATen/test/undefined_tensor_test' failed
make[2]: *** [src/ATen/test/undefined_tensor_test] Error 1
CMakeFiles/Makefile2:264: recipe for target 'src/ATen/test/CMakeFiles/undefined_tensor_test.dir/all' failed
make[1]: *** [src/ATen/test/CMakeFiles/undefined_tensor_test.dir/all] Error 2
../libATen.so.1: undefined reference to `convolve_5x5_sse'
collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
src/ATen/test/CMakeFiles/scalar_test.dir/build.make:114: recipe for target 'src/ATen/test/scalar_test' failed
make[2]: *** [src/ATen/test/scalar_test] Error 1
CMakeFiles/Makefile2:375: recipe for target 'src/ATen/test/CMakeFiles/scalar_test.dir/all' failed
make[1]: *** [src/ATen/test/CMakeFiles/scalar_test.dir/all] Error 2
../libATen.so.1: undefined reference to `convolve_5x5_sse'
collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
src/ATen/test/CMakeFiles/scalar_tensor_test.dir/build.make:114: recipe for target 'src/ATen/test/scalar_tensor_test' failed
make[2]: *** [src/ATen/test/scalar_tensor_test] Error 1
CMakeFiles/Makefile2:301: recipe for target 'src/ATen/test/CMakeFiles/scalar_tensor_test.dir/all' failed
make[1]: *** [src/ATen/test/CMakeFiles/scalar_tensor_test.dir/all] Error 2
Makefile:129: recipe for target 'all' failed
make: *** [all] Error 2

body:
I am experiencing a problem compiling, which involves ATen (I see that some work was done by @gchanan a few hours ago on ATen, but similar issues were also reported days ago). 

I posted earlier the issue in the only issue relevant to _convolve_5x5_sse_ the following: 

[...]
_../libATen.so.1: undefined reference to `convolve_5x5_sse'_
: to install, 
```
export CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH="$(dirname $(which conda))/../" 
conda install numpy pyyaml mkl setuptools cmake cffi
conda install -c soumith magma-cuda80
git clone --recursive https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch 

python setup.py install
```
as per the instructions at https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch#from-source

Results: 
```
../libATen.so.1: undefined reference to `convolve_5x5_sse'
collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
```
